module.name: util/config/common
module.description: Get and set values in the configuration table.

strategy.name: get-config
strategy.description: Get the value for the specified key from the config table. The key is the current term.

strategy.name: get-configs
strategy.description: Get all values of config keys for which 'pred' succeeds. The current term is ignored.
strategy.param: Is applied to the keys of the config table.

strategy.name: get-config-keys
strategy.description: Get all config keys for which pred succeeds
strategy.param: Is applied to the keys of the config table.

strategy.name: set-config
strategy.description: Set an entry (key and value) in the config table.

strategy.name: rm-config
strategy.description: Remove the entry of the specified key from the config table.

strategy.name: toggle-config
strategy.description: Adds an entry to the config table if it does not exist, or removes the entry if it does already exist in the config table.

strategy.name: extend-config
strategy.description: Extends the list of values of the specified key with new values. The values are added in front of the current list.

strategy.name: post-extend-config
strategy.description: Extends the list of values of the specified key with new values. The values are added to the end of the current list.

strategy.name: if-java-platform
strategy.description: Evaluates a strategy f if and only if the program is compiled to Java.

strategy.name: if-c-platform
strategy.description: Evaluates a strategy f if and only if the program is compiled to C.
